title: $:/plugins/xp/aggregation-consumer
name: Consumer
author: kl
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-consumer":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-consumer","description":"create a new consumer","tags":"$:/tags/Actions","text":"\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$ \define get-text() $(textField)$ <$vars textFieldTags={{$:/config/new-consumer/Tags}} textField={{$:/config/new-consumer/Text}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<> tags=<> text=<> caption="a consumer" description="" /> "},"$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-consumercategory":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-consumercategory","description":"create a new category","tags":"$:/tags/Actions","text":"\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$ $(tagsFieldTags)$ \define prefixText() <$text text={{{ [[< \define suffixText() <$text text={{{ [[">>]] }}}/> <$vars newcategoryTitle={{$:/config/new-consumercategory/Title}} newcategoryCaption={{$:/config/new-consumercategory/Caption}} textFieldTags={{$:/config/new-consumercategory/Tags}} tagsFieldTags={{$:/config/new-consumercategory/Tags!!tags}} newcategoryCtag={{$:/config/new-consumercategory/Ctag}} ctagStoreTiddler="$:/config/new-consumercategory/Ctag" storeTiddler="$:/config/new-consumercategory/Title/input" listopsTiddler="$:/consumer-category-others" > <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text=""> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<>/> <$wikify name="newcategoryText" text={{{ [addprefixaddsuffix] }}}> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=""> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text=""> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<> caption=<> tags=<> ctag=<> text=<> list-before=<>/> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=""> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-notify" $param="$:/language/Notifications/ctagEmpty"/> "},"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-consumercategory":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-consumercategory","caption":"{{$:/core/images/new-button}} new category","description":"Create a new category","text":"<$button actions={{$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-consumercategory}} tooltip="Create a new category" aria-label="new category"> Create "},"CONSUMER":{"title":"CONSUMER","caption":"{{$:/xp/images/consumer}} CONSUMER","color":"#bbb","icon":"$:/xp/images/consumer","tmap.id":"7f4c680a-a5ff-4248-8927-3ae143f322ff","text":"\import $:/consumer-macros
<$button actions={{$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-consumer}} tooltip="Create a new consumer" aria-label="new consumer" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} new consumer  <> <>
<$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="$:/consumer-aggregation-view $:/consumer-category-view $:/consumer-recently-added" default="$:/consumer-aggregation-view" state="$:/state/tab/consumer" />"},"$:/consumer-category-others":{"title":"$:/consumer-category-others","caption":"其他","ctag":"Others","tags":"$:/tags/ConsumerCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/consumer-category-人格尊严":{"title":"$:/consumer-category-人格尊严","caption":"人格尊严","ctag":"人格尊严","tags":"$:/tags/ConsumerCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/consumer-category-价格":{"title":"$:/consumer-category-价格","caption":"价格","ctag":"价格","tags":"$:/tags/ConsumerCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/consumer-category-假冒":{"title":"$:/consumer-category-假冒","caption":"假冒","ctag":"假冒","tags":"$:/tags/ConsumerCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/consumer-category-合同":{"title":"$:/consumer-category-合同","caption":"合同","ctag":"合同","tags":"$:/tags/ConsumerCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/consumer-category-售后服务":{"title":"$:/consumer-category-售后服务","caption":"售后服务","ctag":"售后服务","tags":"$:/tags/ConsumerCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/consumer-category-安全":{"title":"$:/consumer-category-安全","caption":"安全","ctag":"安全","tags":"$:/tags/ConsumerCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/consumer-category-虚假宣传":{"title":"$:/consumer-category-虚假宣传","caption":"虚假宣传","ctag":"虚假宣传","tags":"$:/tags/ConsumerCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/consumer-category-计量":{"title":"$:/consumer-category-计量","caption":"计量","ctag":"计量","tags":"$:/tags/ConsumerCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/consumer-category-质量":{"title":"$:/consumer-category-质量","caption":"质量","ctag":"质量","tags":"$:/tags/ConsumerCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/consumer-managetabs":{"title":"$:/consumer-managetabs","caption":"{{$:/core/images/options-button}}","tags":"$:/tags/ConsumerCategories","text":"\import $:/consumer-macros \define selectDefaultTab() <$select tiddler='$:/config/xp/aggregation-consumer/category-view/DefaultTab'> <$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag!has[draft.of]remove[$:/consumer-newcategory $:/consumer-managetabs]] :filter[lookup!match[hide]]'> \end ! 默认分类 设置维基启动后默认显示的标签页：<> ! 管理分类 Select which tabs will be shown. Drag and drop to change the ordering
''Caption'' -- //Ctag// <$macrocall $name="list-tagged-draggable" tag=<> subFilter="!has[draft.of]remove[$:/listing-consumer-all $:/consumer-newcategory $:/consumer-managetabs]" itemTemplate="$:/templates/aggregation-categories-item" />
"},"$:/consumer-newcategory":{"title":"$:/consumer-newcategory","caption":"{{$:/core/images/new-button}}","tags":"$:/tags/ConsumerCategories","text":"\define titleStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-consumercategory/Title \define captionStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-consumercategory/Caption \define ctagStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-consumercategory/Ctag \define storeTiddler() $:/config/new-consumercategory/Title/input \define newButton() {{$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-consumercategory}} \define deleteButton() \whitespace trim <$vars newcategoryTitle={{$:/config/new-consumercategory/Title}}> <$list filter="[get[text]match]" variable="ignore"> <$button tooltip="Delete existing tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini tc-small-gap-right"> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$action-confirm $message="Are you sure you wish to delete this tiddler?"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[] []" /> \end \define promptText() <$vars newcategoryTitle={{$:/config/new-consumercategory/Title}}> <$list filter="[get[text]match]" variable="ignore"> {{$:/aggregation/ErrorText}} \end ! 新建分类 |<$link to=<>>Title |<$edit-text tiddler=<> default="" tag="input"/> <> | |<$link to=<>>Caption |<$edit-text tiddler=<> default="" tag="input"/> | |<$link to=<>>Ctag |<$edit-text tiddler=<> default="" tag="input"/> | |>| <> | <> {{$:/language/xp/aggregation/NewCategoryTips}}"},"$:/consumer-starred-items":{"title":"$:/consumer-starred-items","caption":"Starred","ctag":"Star","tags":"$:/tags/ConsumerCategories","text":"\import $:/consumer-macros {{$:/aggregation-starred-items}}"},"$:/listing-consumer-all":{"title":"$:/listing-consumer-all","caption":"全部","tags":"$:/tags/ConsumerCategories","text":"\import $:/consumer-macros <$macrocall $name="aggregation-list-links" storeTitle="$:/temp/search/consumer/links" searchClass="xp-search-consumer" promptTiddler="$:/consumer-prompt" /> "},"$:/tags/ConsumerCategories":{"title":"$:/tags/ConsumerCategories","list":"$:/listing-consumer-all $:/consumer-starred-items $:/consumer-category-售后服务 $:/consumer-category-合同 $:/consumer-category-质量 $:/consumer-category-价格 $:/consumer-category-虚假宣传 $:/consumer-category-安全 $:/consumer-category-假冒 $:/consumer-category-人格尊严 $:/consumer-category-计量 $:/consumer-category-others $:/consumer-newcategory $:/consumer-managetabs"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation-consumer/DefaultView":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation-consumer/DefaultView","text":"table"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation-consumer/ReadingMode":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation-consumer/ReadingMode","text":"off"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation-consumer/TableFields":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation-consumer/TableFields","text":"tbl-expand title description"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation-consumer/category/preset":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation-consumer/category/preset","text":"Star 售后服务 合同 质量 价格 虚假宣传 安全 假冒 人格尊严 计量 Others"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation-consumer/category-view/DefaultTab":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation-consumer/category-view/DefaultTab","text":"$:/listing-consumer-all"},"$:/config/new-consumer/Tags":{"title":"$:/config/new-consumer/Tags","text":"Consumer"},"$:/config/new-consumer/Text":{"title":"$:/config/new-consumer/Text","text":""},"$:/config/new-consumercategory/Caption":{"title":"$:/config/new-consumercategory/Caption"},"$:/config/new-consumercategory/Ctag":{"title":"$:/config/new-consumercategory/Ctag"},"$:/config/new-consumercategory/Tags":{"title":"$:/config/new-consumercategory/Tags","text":"$:/tags/ConsumerCategories"},"$:/config/new-consumercategory/Title":{"title":"$:/config/new-consumercategory/Title","text":"$:/consumer-category-"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation/ui/consumer":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation/ui/consumer","text":"CONSUMER"},"$:/consumer-aggregation-view":{"title":"$:/consumer-aggregation-view","caption":"聚合视图","text":"\import $:/consumer-macros <$macrocall $name="aggregation-with-tag" state="aggregation-consumer" class="" cardTemplate="$:/aggregation-card-template" searchClass="xp-search-consumer" promptTiddler="$:/consumer-prompt" />"},"$:/consumer-category-view":{"title":"$:/consumer-category-view","caption":"分类视图","text":"\import $:/consumer-macros <$wikify name="tabsList" text="""<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag!has[draft.of]] :filter[lookup!match[hide]]" variable="listItem"> <$text text={{{ [format:titlelist[]] }}}/> """> <$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList=<> default={{$:/config/xp/aggregation-consumer/category-view/DefaultTab}} class="" /> "},"$:/consumer-help":{"title":"$:/consumer-help","color":"#bbb","icon":"$:/core/images/help","text":"
CONSUMER 是消费者问题的索引界面。使用方法与 BOOKSHELF 基本一致，请参阅 [[Bookshelf Help|$:/bookshelf-help]]。
! 如何使用？ 点击 {{$:/core/images/new-button}} new consumer 创建一个消费者问题。发生在别人身上的事，也可能发生在自己身上。 该主题预设分类标签以 [[Title List|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/Title%2520List.html]] 的形式存储于： <> 其他说明： * 分类是根据「[[全国消协组织受理投诉情况分析|https://cca.org.cn/search.html?keyword=受理投诉情况分析]]」给出的「投诉性质」。
''2021年全国消协组织受理投诉情况分析'' 投诉性质分析：售后服务问题占31.54%，合同问题占27.22%，质量问题占20.00%，价格问题占4.42%，虚假宣传问题占4.41%，安全问题占2.93%，假冒问题占1.51%，人格尊严问题占0.72%，计量问题占0.71%，其他问题占6.54%。
* 3·15。
[[国际消费者权益日|https://baike.baidu.com/item/国际消费者权益日/127966]]（World Consumer Rights Day） ，时间为每年的3月15日，由国际消费者联盟组织于1983年确定，目的在于扩大消费者权益保护的宣传，使消费者权益在世界范围内得到重视，以促进各国和地区消费者组织之间的合作与交往，在国际范围内更好地保护消费者权益。
"},"$:/consumer-macros":{"title":"$:/consumer-macros","tags":"$:/tags/Macro/Aggregation","text":"\define aggregationTag() Consumer \define systemCTag() $:/tags/ConsumerCategories \define uiTitle() $:/config/xp/aggregation/ui/consumer \define categoryPrefix() $:/config/xp/aggregation-consumer/category/ \define config-base() $:/config/xp/aggregation-consumer/Tabs/Visibility/ 
<$view field="text"/>
"},"$:/consumer-prompt":{"title":"$:/consumer-prompt","text":"
{{$:/xp/images/consumer-rights}}
New consumer will appear here
"},"$:/consumer-recently-added":{"title":"$:/consumer-recently-added","caption":"最近添加","text":"\import $:/consumer-macros \define configTiddler() $:/temp/consumer/limitparam {{$:/aggregation-recently-added}}"},"$:/xp/images/consumer-rights":{"title":"$:/xp/images/consumer-rights","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":""},"$:/xp/images/consumer":{"title":"$:/xp/images/consumer","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":""}}}
